lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people.

lenders.name: Länna
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and able to pay it forward so other individuals have an opportunity to succeed and be blessed as well.
lenders.occupational_info: Office Manager - I do what is necessary to complete projects as efficiently as possible

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people. I've travelled extensively and have seen how other people live, and I realize they aren't as lucky as some of us here in the United States.
lenders.occupational_info: Before retiring I was a police detective, and investigated crimes. I also prosecuted criminals through the court system.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hard-working women the opportunity to become financially independent and grow to reach their potential.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: it is my way to help those people who have been afforded fewer opportunities than myself and work hard to improve  their life and their family's lives.

lenders.name: Mr.Harper
lenders.loan_because: We have learned about how important entrepreneurs can be to local economies and to  the global economy. We have also learned about the importance of non-profit organizations in global development.
lenders.occupational_info: We are 16-18 year-old students in Grade 11 and 12 in Mr.Harper's class at Lorne Park Secondary School in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We are all part of the same family.  When one of us is not happy, it is up to the rest of us to help however we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer my time in various ways:   playing clarinet in musical groups that give concerts in schools, churches, and nursing homes;  helping raise money for homes and schooling for children who need special care.  I also take care of my husband, my father and mother, and my garden, and I am a mother and grandmother.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 4th grade at a large elementary school.  I have twenty-three 9 and 10 year old students in my class.

lenders.name: Rafi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who need some help to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sophomore in high school.

lenders.name: Doug MacNeil
lenders.loan_because:
I grew up in the town that is the home of the Coady Institute (http://www.coady.stfx.ca/).
Its just the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Capt!n Ken
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva's mission melds perfectly with Schumacher's ("Small Is Beautiful") concept of village-based economics (Buddhist Economics), a concept that appeals to me.  It is the socially-minded, right-thinking, pragmatic thing to do. And surprisingly, it is also the environmentally right thing to do: you are not providing tractors when hand tools will do; you are not providing help that requires an environmentally violent, destructive and costly infrastructure to support.

Kiva works at the right scale - the human scale.  I want to be part of the "pay it forward” consciousness.  It is just a small contribution towards making this a better world to live in.

lenders.name: Harmen Jan
lenders.loan_because:
I'm so incredible blessed, that i just want to be a blessing!
God be the glory and honor for that!

lenders.name: Craig Shaw
lenders.loan_because: if you give a man a fish you can feed him for a meal, give him a rod and he can feed himself for life.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: i want to start my own business to sustian me.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this thing together

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I'm a former banker and a current development worker, and this is where the two sides meet -- right where individuals need working capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage grants and am the main point of contact for our home office for relief and development efforts in South Asia.

lenders.name: AVID
lenders.loan_because: We want to empower these people with the ability to take care of themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a high school class in Gilbert Arizona.  
Teacher: Lisa Knipp

lenders.loan_because: I am seeking a loan to start a new non profit foundation for education.  I am trying to raise $5,000 for establishment fees, thank you !

lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked with charities for over 20 years, mostly in accounting.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Lawyer. I try to help people with problems with law.

lenders.occupational_info: Failure Analysis on Seagate's hard drive.

lenders.name: Matt & Stacey
lenders.loan_because: Other people loaned money to us to start our business. We're returning the favour.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.occupation: Director, Operations for a hotel company

lenders.name: 2nieces
lenders.loan_because:
The family of David Malone requested that expressions of sympathy be made in the form of donations to a local library, nature conservancy, or by participating in micro-lending via the website kiva.org. 

Kiva.org touched my heart.  What a way to celebrate life!

I decided to get my 2 nieces involved in the selection process to inspire them just as Dave has inspired his children, his family and all the people he came in contact with.

lenders.name: Abhishek
lenders.occupation: MBA Student at Mays Business School,Texas A&M Univ

lenders.name: poliana
lenders.loan_because: I need money to buy clothes and resell Because I have a small child and I am unemployed.

lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student who just wants to make a difference in the world.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because it helps people who genuinely need a helping hand. Plus, it makes me feel all warm and fuzzy ;-)

lenders.name: Belly Sutra

lenders.occupational_info: I would describe my job as working with a doctor who specializes in the area of the mouth. I take x-rays, and I help the dentist in procedures such as tooth extractions.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others become able  to support themselves and their families.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for the City of Henderson, Nevada, outside Las Vegas.

lenders.name: wainaina

lenders.occupational_info: At a cross roads in my life - living in the mystery and ready to make some big changes.  As a poet and artist at heart,  life is my canvas.

lenders.loan_because: there is no reason not to.

lenders.loan_because: This is my way of giving back.  I started my own business and all these people need so little to do the same thing.  It will make such a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Garrison

"Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did unto Me."  

Matthew 25:40

lenders.name: Nathanael
lenders.loan_because:
I'm able to help, because I have a good-paying steady job and more money than I need to sustain a good and happy life and therefore I have a responsibility to share that surplus which I do not need with my neighbours in less fortunate circumstances.

I also think Kiva is great concept; I donate to local and international aid agencies who help people in need with medicines, accommodation and such but there's more to life than just having somewhere to sleep and something to eat - and I think Kiva and their partner agencies helps people and particularly entrepreneurs realise their dreams and achieving something in building better lives for themselves and their community at a level above just basic needs.

lenders.name: Dietmar
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship, and In Private Loans with low interests.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an Entrepreneur now working in the Internet Industry. Project development and Online Marketing.
I am always here to help, young , talented and hardworking people.

lenders.name: Wilton
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give people a chance to create a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Just chillin'

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I would like to be helpful to those who need just a little extra assistance to get to where they want to go.  It is a small role that we lenders play, as the entrepreneurs are doing all the hard work.  I admire them.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent the United States overseas, and I like to make positive connections between my country and others around the world.  Although lending via Kiva is not related to my work, it is done in the same hopeful spirit.

lenders.occupational_info: My company provides architectural design and engineering services around the world.  Personally, I handle the business affairs and keep the company moving forward.

lenders.occupational_info: Designing for web and print almost 15 years now.

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because: I think this a wonderful idea and is what life is about (helping people).
lenders.occupational_info: It's just work at this point. Eventually I hope to do my own thing and be financially free. Don't we all want to be???

lenders.occupation: High School English Teacher - Gwangju, South Korea
lenders.loan_because: I can help. Also, I'm on a bit of a bucket list-esque mission to contribute to people in all 81 countries of Kiva's lending portfolio. As of Jul. 2015: 78/81
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm grateful my 20s have been a debt-free decade backpacking through work with meaning (figuratively and literally backpacking). Some of that work includes TOMS, The White House, two proud terms of national service with AmeriCorps, teaching abroad, and building businesses in the Gift Economy.

AdamGreenberg.com is the official website of some guy by the same name.

lenders.name: Nathalie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who were born less fortunate to improve their life circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Creating connection, that's my passion! Between organizations and purposes, management and staff, senders and receivers, reason and emotion. I have over 10 years experience in comprehensive customer and stakeholder engagement and master the subtleties of traditional, social and cross-media. For Power2Improve I provide workshops, training and advice on marketing, communications, public relations, social media, journalistic writing, personal branding and leadership skills. Stimulating and inspiring to excel, challenging to be authentic. In short: humanizing business, helping to connect!

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to share what little wealth I have;  what would probably be a great wealth to many KIVA borrowers.  I look forward to their successes and am glad that KIVA exists to allow for these micro-loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large jail as a Registered Nurse.  The inmate population we serve is often in jail for drug or alcohol related offenses.  As a nurse, I evaluate their needs for medical attention, including making sure that any chronic or acute illnesses are addressed at their admissions and that they receive the medical regimen they require.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.occupational_info: I work in scientific research.

lenders.name: Plny Tvar
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he will be full for a day - teach him to fish and he will be fed his whole life!

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to be able to give back some of what I have been blessed with. I think that everyone should be given a chance to better themselves and succeed in life. This is a wonderful organization to be a part of. There is nothing like the feeling of being able to help someone else who is less fortunate. God Bless the people who started this organization. This is truly wonderful work.  Thanks to everyone else who gives. It is my goal to lend at least $100.00 per month. The hardest thing I find is choosing who I lend to. I wish I had a million dollars or could win the lottery because I can honestly say that after I gave to my church this is the next place I would go to distribute funds. I look at the pictures and see the faces and it just makes me smile. I love to get the emails on the updates. I read my lender page several times a week. I love to see where everyone is at and how they are progressing. The money is not important. What is important to me is that they all reach their goals. I wish I could do more to help. My daughter and I are starting and online business. We have not decided exactly what but 50% of all profits are coming here to help those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I audit accounts of companies that come to me as uncollectable or the customer is refusing to pay. I try and contact them and see if there is a way to get the account settled. If not I then send the accounts out to attorneys or collection agencies to be resolved.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney who  defends people who are in some trouble.

lenders.name: James, Will & Ally
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other families

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: jesus wants us to love and help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I assemble high and low pressure switches that are used in hydraulic for military equipment and vehicles to marine,farm ,construction and off -highway vehicles.ect....I love doing my job i try to learn something new every day .

lenders.name: Jerry & April
lenders.occupation: Senior Contract Engineer & Stay at Home Mom
lenders.loan_because: We were given a $25 gift certificate from April's mother (Brenda) for Christmas.  She owns a dancewear clothing store and really appreciates how hard it is to start a business.  We believe it's important to help others.  We admire people that are starting their own business.  We've always been the type of people that believe it's better to give than receive.  It's very rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info:
Jerry works as an pump engineer for a company that makes pumps for chemical and process industries throughout the world.

April is a stay at home mom and manages the household and looks after our 4 year old son John Charles and our 2 year old daughter Lillyanne Rose.

lenders.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus Christ and He calls us to invest everything that He has given us in sharing His love with the world by meeting our neighbors' needs.

lenders.name: MH Holden
lenders.loan_because:
Travel is a passion on mine. I try to travel in a way that lets me better experience what its like for the people living in those areas.
From those travels I've learned we are all the same, be it from New York or Yeji Ghana, our needs and hopes are not all that different; good health for our children, food for the nights dinner, a safe and warm place to sleep.
Being able to help with a loan lets me feel, in some small part, I've continued that connection.
lenders.occupational_info: I map the land. I measure how things like hills, rivers, roads, and buildings fit and relate to one another. From those measurements I then make "models" of the land and those who need to, can use that information to manage resources or engineer a road, or a bridge or a home.

everybody needs a chance to realize

Especially for us privileged people, these loans are a small price to pay and they make a great difference to helping individuals care for themselves and their families, especially in areas where opportunities do not come knocking.

we decided to help as many people in need as we possibly can. JJMKgroup was originally created for the essential purpose of helping people to help themselves live fuller, supercalifragilisticexpialidocious more fun and fulfilling lives.  

Thank you Friends and Family. Thank you Jesus. Thank you Lord.
lenders.occupational_info: OUR MISSION. JJMKgroup exists to make a difference in people’s lives by bringing together the best individuals, inspiring persons to provide funds through Kiva producing an ample money stream and advancing more and more research plus developing continuous investment & improvement. We are funding projects for people to make life better and more stress-free as best we can. God bless you all. Amen.
